title.en: Russian Grammar II (100% Web-Based), Level B1
title.et: Vene keele grammatika II (100% e-õpe), tase B1

description.en:
Course is designed for students who have previously studied Russian and reached the level A2+.

Functionally structured materials and exercises enable learners to obtain grammatical knowledge that will help to improve their writing and speaking skills in Russian. All the exercises are interactive and cover following topics:

Conjugation types of verbs (present tense),
Irregular verbs,
Reflexive verbs,
Past and future tenses,
Verb aspect,
Verbs of motion.
description.et:
Kursuse raames võetakse läbi vene keele grammatika põhiteemad vastavalt tasemele B1. Funktsionaalselt üles ehitatud materjal võimaldab omandada grammatilisi oskusi kõnekeele arendamiseks.
Kursuse jooksul võetakse läbi grammatiliste teemade teooria. Kõik harjutused on interaktiivsed ja jagatud teemade kaupa.
Teemad:
1. Tegusõnade pööramine - olevik.
2. Irregulaarsed tegusõnad.
3. Enesekohased tegusõnad.
4. Tegusõnad minevikus ja tulevikus.
5. Tegusõnade aspekt.
6. Liikumisverbid.

objectives.en: The overall aim of the course is to provide a learner with a better knowledge of Russian grammar at the Level B1.
objectives.et: Ülevaade vene keele grammatika põhiteemadest ning grammatiliste oskuste arendamine tasemele B1.

learning_outcomes.en:
After completing the course a student should be able to:

- understand Russian verb system in general,
- understand how to use aspect forms of verbs,
- understand how to use verbs of motion,
- apply the theoretical knowledge into practice.

notes.et: Please note! The course is entirely held in Moodle. Exchange students may receive the differentiated grade if needed. Office hours of Mihhail Orehhov: Jakobi 2-129, 15:00 (every Friday). Feel free to come and ask any questions.

grade_preconditions.et:
Kontrolltööd avatakse ainult siis, kui kõik eelmised harjutused on sooritatud (vähemalt 70% õigeid vastuseid).
Võlgnevuste likvideerimine kuni 23.12.2018.

To get access to the tests, you must complete all previous exercises with at least 70% of the correct answers.
All tests must be completed until 23.12.2018.

grade_evaluation.et:
Kontrolltöö 1 (vähemalt 70% õigeid vastuseid) + kontrolltöö 2 (vähemalt 70% õigeid vastuseid) + kontrolltöö 3  (vähemalt 70% õigeid vastuseid).

Test 1 (at least 70% of the correct answers) + Test 2 (at least 70% of the correct answers) + Test 3 (at least 70% of the correct answers).
